name: Block Puzzle Revolution
description:
Block Puzzle Revolution is a classic jewel style block puzzle game.

Block Puzzle Revolution is a tradittion style but pretty hard . Can you finish through 1000 point.
Block Puzzle Revolution is a fun puzzle game for all adults and children. It is simple, but difficult to master. Play this jewel block game to relax and train your brain.You can play this jewel puzzle block anytime and anywhere!

How to Play Puzzle Block Revolution?
* Tap the blocks to fill square.
* Fill blocks horizontal line or clear it to clear jewel block and lower the blocks.
* Eliminate more block and score more points

Feature of Block Puzzle Revolution
* Fun and classic brick game
* Easy control to play.
* Beautiful blocks.
* No time limits and no wifi need.

Challenge this addictive puzzle game and blast blocks with the fastest speed.

Download this simple but addictive block puzzle revolution game now!
